title: Denial of service (segfault) due to null pointer dereference in mrb_obj_instance_eval
vulnerability_information:
Introduction
============

Provided PoC segfaults at mrb_obj_instance_eval due to null pointer dereference.

Proof of concept
================
Attached the poc.

Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!

Thank you for your report.

This issue has the same root cause as https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3359 and so we're closing this as a duplicate.
I had a second look at this, and I'm not so sure it's a duplicate. I'll open an issue upstream, and once it's resolved it should be clear whether the root cause is the same.

I've opened this issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3432

Thanks again for your report.

Thanks again for your report. This issue was fixed upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/af4d74fc7df9788a1c0013a4dc66e9bbac951b20
